nodes.text: Divorce was a process through which a married couple could legally end their marriage. Though frowned upon in most cultures,[source?] divorce was a frequent occurrence within the galaxy.

The Hapan Ta'a Chume once tried to convince her son, Isolder, to divorce his wife Teneniel Djo. Corran Horn also feared that his wife, Mirax Terrik Horn, would divorce him after he forgot to kiss her goodbye.
